title: Cutie Honey The Live
overview: The latest in a series of tellings of the Cutie Honey manga/anime. Honey Kisaragi is a cyborg girl who can morph into numerous costumes appropriate to the situation when she touches her heart shaped necklace while saying the words "Honey Flash". Unknown to her at the start of the series, Honey has two sisters Miki and Yuki who also have transformation abilities - though not without their problems.
